name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

scorePolicy:
Weekly in-class participation and performance: 20%

5 vocabulary quizzes: 20%

Group presentation: 30%
There should be 4 or 5 students in one group. Each group have 25 to 30 minutes to introduce a film. The presentation should consist of the following three parts: 
1.　　Basic information, such as release date, director, main actors/actress, and plot. 
2.　　Why is the film chosen? What's so interesting about it?
3.　　Select and introduce a scene, play the clip (from YouTube, Netflix or DVD), and do a 5-minute performance of voice acting of this scene.
4.     Raise 2 or 3 interesting questions for class discussion
*Please note that each group member should contribute equally to the presentation. A note of work distribution should be handed in before presentation.

Final exam (individual conversation with the instructor): 30%
